alert.note: Alert for Davidson; Robertson; Sumner (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:02PM CDT until August 29 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DAVIDSON...SOUTHWESTERN SUMNER AND SOUTHEASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 301 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Goodlettsville, or 12 miles southeast of Springfield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Madison, Hendersonville, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Ridgetop and Whites Creek. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 92 and 110. Interstate 24 between mile markers 36 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
